c74object.name: el.latch~
c74object.description: el.latch~ holds an incoming click for a specified amount of time. This enables sample-accurate driving of objects that require a sustained signal rather than a click trigger, e.g. in cases where the transition from non-zero to zero is interpreted as a "note-off" or release.

objarg.name: latch duration
objarg.description: The duration of the latch. This can be reset through the rightmost inlet.
